duties_responsibilities.duty: Primary duty - programming (for jobs and quotes) and set up
Running machines is a secondary duty - as needed for time sensitive jobs
Ability to learn how to create fixtures, custom jaws, etc. is a plus
Ability to use MasterCam to program CNC lathes and do some G-code editing on machines when necessary
SolidWorks used to develop parts or to view and check customer CAD models
Ability to work well in a collaborative environment
Take CAD model or drawing and translate to machine code (Mastercam or conversational programming a plus)
Create plan for cutting a part in a mill – machine will be set up to cut parts with their program
Ability to manage lead time and ensure quality

education_certification.credential: Certifications in CNC Programming and SolidWorks are a plus
